1.content: Now its time for you to choose the gender of the the character you want to be tickled.
1.title: Choose your gender

11.content: So you chose for the guys to be tickled. Now all you need is to pick which one.
11.title: The Guys

111.content: You've chosen for the Avatar to be tickled. So pick who will tickle him and let's get started.
111.title: Aang the Avatar

choices: Is about to walk over to his feet, when he decides to train with her
1111.content:
After being defeated at the Eclipse Invasion, Aang was really down.
"Hey, Aang, come here and let's do some more training," Katara said, standing by the airbending temple's water fountain.
"I dunno, I don't really feel like training right now and besides, Zuko is laying in the fountain," Aang replied, gloomily.
"No, go ahead," Zuko, said, "I was just leaving, to go fishing with the group."
"See, now come here," Katara insisted.
"Fine," Aang replied. He slipped of his robes and jumped into the fountain in his trunks.
He got in and decided in stead of getting in his usual fighting stance, he just floated to the bottom.
"Hey, get up!" Katara yelled.
"I'm to upset to train right now," Aang said, his face sinking below the surface.
"If you don't cheer up, right now, I'll make you!" Katara shouted.
"Ugh," Aang groaned, sinking deeper.
"That's it, I've had it," she yelled. Katara moved her arms gracefully, waterbending Aang into an ice block that went all the way from his face, from his ankles.

She then...
1111.title: Waterbending training with Katara

choices: "I'm sorry, but I just don't see any other way to cheer you up,"
"Oh, alright if you really don't want me, too."
11111.content:
Katara walks over to the end of the floating ice block and bends down at Aangs feet.
"Hey, wh-what are you doing?" Aang asked, nervously.
"Just cheering you up that's all," Katara said, sweetly.
"Um, that's okay, I think I'll just go lay down," Aang replied.
"No, no, no, I need to cheer you up right now," Katara said, "Aang, are you, by any chance, ticklish."
"What! Wh-Why would you ask that," Aang asked, frightened.
"Because, that's how I'll cheer you up," Katara replied as she drew one finger up his left sole, "And judging by the way you tried to pull away and the grin you had, I'd say you are!"
"N-NO! I'm not t-ticklish at a-all," Aang stuttered, he remembered how the other airbenders use to hold him down and tickle him until he passed out. They usually, left his feet alone, though, because once they had tickled him there and he went into the avatar state and destroyed a whole floor of a building.
"Oh, but I think you are, and I just have to cheer you up," she replied calmly.
"NO, Please, don't I'll train with you, just please don't tickle my feet!" Aang yelled.

Katara then said,...
11111.title: The Avatar is Ticklish

choices: let him go, he's had enough.
keep tickling, and kick it up a notch.
111111.content:
Just as Aang was about to make another plea, Katara reached down and with her long nails, poked all around Aang's foot, trying to find a ticklish spot. Much to her delight though, all of it was! Aang tried to break free, but he couldn't even wiggle his fingers. Katara, had gathered enough information, so she started to, just tickle and tease, all around Aangs foot.
"Kootchie, Kootchie Koo, is the wittle avatar ticklish," She said, as she scratched his arches really well.
"NOOOAHAHAA HAHAPLEASEHAHA STOHAHAP!" He, screamed in between his laughter. "KATARAHAHA PLEASE DON'T AIIII," shreaked Aang as she dug right into the area under his toes.
"Ya know Aang, I always knew, you were ticklish, but I had no idea!" She yelled delightedly.

After that she decided to, ...
111111.title: Aangs Feet, Finally Tickled

choices: pulls out a big fluffy feather and a long stiff feather.
1111112.content:
She kept tickling and tickling and he was howling with laughter, "HAHAHAHA NOOHAMOREHA PLEASEEEEE!" She decided he was a little short on air, so she stopped to give him a little break.
"Aang, you have got to have the most ticklish feet in all of the universe, although, it probably doesn't help that you keep off your feet a lot, with flying and stuff." Katara stated.
"Your, right, now will you please let me go," Aang pleaded.
"Not, just yet, I still have a couple tricks up my sleeve," She replied mischevously.
"NO PLEEASEHAHAHA NOHAHA MERCYHAHA!" He shouted just as she started to tickle again. Just when he though it was the worst thing that could ever happen, she...
1111112.title: The Avatar's Torture

11111122.content:
She pulls out the two feathers and looks at him evilly.
"NO, PLEASE DON'T DO IT!" He shouted.
"Too, late," Katara says, as he pulls the big one threw his toes, back and forth and tickles his arches with the other.
"NOHOHAAHA NOT THAT HAHAAHA PLEAASEHAHA" he screams. He shouts and yells and laughs hysterically, but all she does is keep on. Just then he turns the the long, stiff feather around and starts to scribble quickly on the side on his right arch, ball and heel. "HAHAHA I CAN'THAHA TAKE IT ANY MORE! HAHAHAHA PLEAAAHAHA!" Aang screams, "AHAHAHA PLEASE PLEASE AHAHAA! AAIII, PLEASE I'M HAHA TOO TICKLISH HAHAHAAAHA!"
Just then she stopped. "I think you've learned your lesson," Katara says,"just don't put yourself down so much on failing, it was all our faults."
"Okay, now can you please let me out, it really freezing in here," Aang asks.
"Yeah, sure," she replies releasing the ice and freeing him, but not before giving his sole one more tickle, getting a yelp.
"Please, don't tell anyone else that I'm ticklish," Aang, says, "And I'd rather you didn't tickle me anymore either."
"Well, in respond to the first question, sure, but the second," she said, "I don't know."
"Fair enough, well, let's do some training!" he says enthusiastically.

'I wonder where else he's ticklish,' she thinks to herself.
11111122.title: The Dreaded Feathers!

1121.content: Everyone was resting at Zuko's father's house and Zuko was teaching Aang firebending. They all decided that they needed firewood so they all voted Sokka to go get it, Zuko volunteered to help carry. So Sokka and Zuko took off, Sokka taking the lead and Zuko following. Zuko wanted to get back at Sokka for making fun of him the previous day so very silently Zuko ran and tackled Sokka to the ground. Sokka yelled at Zuko so Zuko pulled out some metal fire nation rope and tied Sokka in the shape of an L with his hands tied above his head and ripped off his own belt and gagged Sokka with it. Sokka was screaming underneath his sweaty belt gag. Zuko knew Sokka's feet were ticklish cause he tested it out by touching his foot the previous night, getting giggles out of him. Zuko removes one of Sokka's boots exposing one of his sweaty stinky bare foot. Zuko takes a big wiff of Sokka's boot *mmmmmmmm* he said, "sooo smelly". He then removed the other doing the same. He shoved the boot in Sokka's face forcing him to inhale his own stench. Sokka's jerks trying to avoid the smelly boot but fails. Zuko sets both boots down and removes his own boots repeating the group smelling, forcing Sokka too smell his sweaty boot and sets them back down next to Sokka's. Zuko then sits Japanese style in front of Sokka's smelly, sweaty, exposed tan feet. Zuko then lift's up the feet and runs five finger's down both feet, Sokka giggles and screams from under his gag. Zuko smiled and didn't hesitate to start scraping down on his toes, arches, and soles, Sokka starts screaming, tears and sweat running down his face. Zuko starts evilly chuckling. Zuko then changes position to lying stomach down on sokka with his smelly firebending feet in Sokka's face and wraps his hands around Sokka's feet and starts crazily scrapping his nails on the young warriors feet leaving no spot untouched. Sokka was screaming from his gag, this was pure torture being tickled so hard and forcibly smelling Zuko's sweaty stinky dogs. Zuko changed his position again pushing his feet deeply into Sokka's muffled face to move up. Zuko then sit's in front of Sokka pushing his feet into Sokka's playing footsie. Sokka was relieved this was all, but his celebration was too soon he realized when Zuko started scraping his toenails into Sokka's feet, Sokka then sat back drooling, sweating, crying, and screaming realizing that it wasn't over yet.
1121.title: Zuko

11211.content: Zuko decides to continue the horrible torture. Zuko continued to tease Sokka and his feet by tickling them with his toe nails, this was genius he thought to himself. Next time Sokka would think twice before making fun of the great fire prince Zuko. The scent eminating from Sokka's smelly feet intrigued Zuko. Zuko then lay down on his stomach with Sokka's feet in his face and his own feet folded above his back. He started lightly tickling the warrior's feet with his eyelashes, his nose indented between the warriors feet during the torture. He then starts picking up the pace shaking his long brown beautiful hair on the boy's feet, each strand teasing the boy's foot. he finally decides to finalize the pace by running his warm tongue up and down the warriors feet causing the warrior too cry desperately, for he didn't even mean the comment he made the previous day but he certainly learned his lesson. Zuko smiles and starts shoving his tongue cruelly in between the toes transporting toe jam into his mouth with each lash. Sokka was livid screaming like death was awaiting him yet laughing and blushing greatly like it was some kind of sick joke. Zuko's tongue reminded him that it wasn't a joke and this was honestly cruel torture. Zuko started winding through Sokka's smelly toes like a snake with his tongue when the teenage waterbender passed out unluckily. Zuko took one last wiff of Sokka's boots and slipped them back on, following with his. Now he just needed to get his story straight for when Sokka cam back too his senses.
11211.title: Zuko continues the horrible torture

11212.content: Zuko decides too intensify the torture even further. Zuko situates himself laying down on sokka with his back first and his feet in Sokka's face and Sokka's feet on his face. He then removes Sokka's gag and state's, "Okay Sokka now you are too worship my feet", shoving them closer to Sokka's sweaty face. Sokka exclaimed, " NO! Are you disgusting your feet smell like road kill there's no way I would ever do that". "Okay", Zuko said. I'll just have to convince you, smirking. He then take's another wiff of the warrior's feet and ignites one of his finger's with fire. He then places his finger on the sole of the boy's foot. "OUCH!", Sokka exclaimed. Zuko then ignite's both index finger's and places them on both sole's leaving them for 3 seconds. "OUCH OUCH OUCH!" , Sokka exclaimed again. By now Sokka is crying from the extreme pain. "If you want me to stop, you know what you have to do.", Zuko said. "Okay! Fine!", Sokka said. "Just Stop!". Zuko smiled pressing his sweaty smelly feet in Sokka's face. Sokka then stuck out his dried out tongue from the gag and ran it along Zuko's foot *cringing*. "Good", Zuko Said. "Continue". "Whyyyy!?", Sokka said angrily. Zuko left no time but too ignite all five finger's and start wiggling his finger's on Sokka's smelly feet. "AHAHAHAHA OUCH!" ,Sokka said. "Okay Okay Okay". Sokka then stuck his tongue in between Zuko's right pinky toe collecting toe jam *cringing* and gulping unreadily. "Stop cringing!", Zuko said angrily. Tear's started running down Sokka's face and Zuko muffled them, pushing his big toes into Sokka's eye lids. "Continue!" Zuko said. Zuko holds off and first places the drooly sweaty belt on Zuko's eyes and then putting his feet back in the boy's face "Continue!", he said again. Sokka, still crying started massaging Zuko's smelly sweaty feet with his tongue still crying. Zuko returns the favor Massaging and tickling Sokka's feet with his tongue aswell, only making Sokka more uncomfortable successfully. "Ahhh this is truely the best trip to get firewood I've ever been on wouldn't you say so too Sokka!?", Zuko said smirking. "mhm", Sokka muffled sarcastically from under the fire prince's feet. "Okay that's it I'm done with your Sarcasm!" Zuko said kicking Sokka's head with his sweaty, smelly, wet foot and burning Sokka's toes until he passed out. Zuko ripped up the metal rope burned his gag slipped both their boots back on and cooked up a story for when Sokka arose.
11212.title: Zuko intensifies the torture

choices: Sokkka make's fun of Zuko again
Sokka never make's fun of Zuko agian
11213.content: Zuko decides too stop the torture for now untieing Sokka and telling him if he ever ever made fun of him again he would torture him again but 10x worse chuckling. Sokka agreed, for now.
11213.title: Zuko stops the torture

1122.content:
This particular story takes place in the third season, before the Invasion, more specifically, in between the 6th and 7th episode. (I say in between because obviously they don't put every day into an episode so, yeah).

"Hey, what's a matter Momo?" Aang asked, waking up. "Hey where's Sokka?" Aang asked Katara as she woke up.
"What do you mean, wait, he's not here!" she yelled. "Last night he went to get more wood, but he should have gotten back last night!"
"Toph! Get up!" Aang yelled.
"Wh-What!?" Toph replied, waking up.
"Sokka's been captured! We have to go save him!" Katara explained.
The gang got on Appa and flew into the sky, looking for Sokka.
1122.title: Sokka is Captured?

11221.content:
"H-huh!? Where, where am I?" Sokka asked, waking up. "Why am I tied up!? Who's there?" He asked, hearing someone enter the room.
"Hello Sokka, my name does not matter, all that matters is that you tell me where the Avatar is," the assassin replied.
"Wait, your that guy who shoots beams from his head!" Sokka said.
"Yes, but I'm not who you should be worried about, she is!" said, the assassin, motioning to the door a women entered the room, holding a bag.
She was tall, thin and had long brown hair, but her face was covered by a mask, she also had really long finger nails.
"So Sokka are you going to tell this man where the Avatar is, or do I have to torture you to get it out?" The woman asked.
"NO! I'll never tell!" Sokka said.
"Okay then," she replied, moving down to his foot and and drew her nail up the sole, from the heel to the toes, making Sokka giggle.
"Hahaha Stahap, Wh-what are you doing?" Sokka asked, giggling.
"Convincing you, why, are you ticklish?" she asked.
"N-no not at all," Sokka stuttered.
"Okay then I'll just start, where to start though?" she said.
11221.title: Sokka's Interrogater

choices: Sokka's most ticklish spot are his arm pits
Sokka's most ticklish spot is his stomach
112212.content:
"So how ticklish are these feet of yours?" the woman asked.
"Please don't tickle me!" Sokka begged.
"Sure, if you tell us where the avatar is," she replied.
"Never!" Sokka insisted.
"Fine, have it your way," she said, gliding her fingers all over Sokka's soles, making him start giggling.
"Hahaha Pleeease stahahap aaaaahahaHAhahaHAha hahaHAHA HAHAAHAHAHAHAHA PLEASE STAHAHAP!" Sokka laughted, his giggling turning into laughter, as she tickled his toes.
Sokka's feet were rough, from walking so much, making the balls and heels, slightly less ticklish, but when the lady tickled his arches and toes, he burst out with laughter.
"AAAAHAHAHAHAH PLEEEEASE PLEEEEASE STAHAHAHAP HAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEASE STAHAHAHAP!" Sokka screamed.
"Are you ready to talk?" she asked.
"NO!" Sokka yelled, with persistence.
"Okay, I'll have to use this brush, made especially for tickling." she said.
The brush was long and skinny, with a mixture or soft and stiff feathers and thick bristles, which vibrated when turned on. She did so and scrubbed Sokka's arches and toes, causing him to erupt in laughter.
"AAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEASE STAHAHAHAHAP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STAHAHAHAP STAHAHAHAHAP!" Sokka screamed.
"Well, are you ready to tell where he is?" she asked again.
"Never!" Sokka yelled.
"Okay, well lets move some where else," she said.
"OH NO! If she tickles me on my most ticklish spot, I don't know if I'll be able to hold out!" Sokka thought to himself.
112212.title: Sokka's Feet

1122122.content:
With out a word, the lady moved up to his arm pits and started spidering her fingers in them, every so often tickle his ribs, he was pretty ticklish there so he burst out in laughter with every scratch.
"AAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEEASE STAHAHAHAP I CAN'T TAKE IT HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STAHAHAHAHAP IT PLEEEEEEEEASE!" Sokka shouted.
"Ready to talk?" she asked again.
"No-hohoho AAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEEASE AHAHAHAHAHAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Sokka said, as the women immediately started tickling.
"Well, I've tickled your feet, arm pits and ribs, the only place left is your stoma..." she started.
"NO, PLEASE ANYWHERE, ANYTHING BUT THAT PLEEEASE!" Sokka pleaded.
"Aww, is your wittle tummy ticklwish? Well I'm going to!" she said.

Meanwhile, Aang, Katara and Toph had landed at there camp site after searching for Sokka for an hour.
"What should we do!?" Katara said, panicking.
"Well, lets split up, Toph, you go that way, I'll go this way and Katara you fly on Appa and go that way. Let's me up here in about 15 minutes, okay?" Aang suggested.
"Okay," Katara and Toph said simultaneously.

While this was happening, Sokka was just about to get tickled on his most ticklish spot, his stomach. The lady turned on the vibrator and started to scrub the brush up and down Sokka's smooth stomach and she even dipped the end side of it, which was a cone-shaped vibrator, that was covered in feathers, into his belly-button.
"AAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOOOOOOOOOOOO PLEEEEEEASE NOT MY BELLY AHAHAHAAHAHAHHAHA I CAN'T TAKE IT AAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA NOOOOOOOO NOT MY BELLY-BUTTON PLEEEEEASE HAVE MERCY AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STAAHAHAHAP I'M GONNA DIE! JUST STAHAHAHAHAP! OKAY OKAY I'LL TELL I'LL TELL, JUST STAHAHAHAHAHP!" Sokka caved.
"Aww, I was having fun," she said, as the assassin walked in.
Sokka told the assassin and he went to find Aang, while the lady through Sokka in a cage.
1122122.title: Sokka's Ticklish Tummy

choices: Katara and Toph save him and Sokka
11221221.content:
Aang got back first and decided to wait for the others, unfortunately for him, during his wait, he fell asleep. A few minutes after he did, the assassin, sparky-sparky-boom-man or combustion man got to the camp and quickly captured Aang, before he could get up. Aang was knock out while in the bag, he woke up tied up like a mummy and tied to a metal table, only his head and feet were loose. He looked to the right and managed to see Sokka in a cell.
"Sokka, There you are!" Aang yelled.
"Yeah, sorry for you getting captured, I told them where we camped," Sokka replied.
"What did they do to you?" Aang asked.
"Well they, they umm..." Sokka started.
"What, what did they do?" Aang demanded.
"They, They tickled me, okay," Sokka said.
"They did, I didn't even know you were ticklish," Aang said.
"Well I am, but don't..." Sokka started.
"WAIT, you don't think there going to tickle me do you!?" Aang asked, slightly frightened.
"I wouldn't thinks so, but maybe, why are you ticklish?" Sokka asked.
"Umm, yeah, insanely," Aang admitted, blushing.
Just then the assassin walked in and said, "Although, the fire nation paid for your life, someone else paid for you to be tortured for a while so here she is," he said as the interrogation lady walked in.
"Ah, the avatar, of all the guys I've tickled, I've never tickled the avatar," she said.
"Well you don't have to, PLEASE DON'T!" Aang begged.
"Sorry, tell me are these tootsies your most ticklish spot?" she asked.
"Yes, yes, but please don't tickle me, pleeease," Aang pleaded.
Then...
11221221.title: Aang's Capture

choices: The women left and came back much later
112212211.content:
Unfortunately for Aang, she didn't listen to him and started tickling. Aang's feet were soft and smooth and extremely ticklish, mostly because he flew around so much amd stepped very lightly when he was on the ground. At first she just drew her nails up and down his soles, making him squirm and giggle, then she moved on to scribbling all over his soles.
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEEASE STAHAHAHAHAP I CAN'T TAKE IT! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEEEASE I'M TOOOO TICKLISH! AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Aang screamed.
"Wow, I've never met anyone as ticklish as you and I've tickled a lot of guys!" she exclaimed.
After saying that and giving Aang a break, she pulled up his toes and tickled under them, which she followed up by tickling his feet with the brush and using the back-side under his toes, causing him to explode with laughter.
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOOOOOOO NOT THE TOES! PLEEEEASE I'M GONNA DIE AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEASE STAHAHAHAP! WAIT, NO NO NOOOOOOOOOOO! AAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOT THE BRUSH! NOOOOOOOO! AAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEEEASE NOT THE TOES PLEEEEEEASE, I'LL DO ANYTHING! AAAAAAA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEEEEEEE....eee...e.." Aang said, fainting.
Just then...
112212211.title: The Insanely Ticklish Avatar

1122122111.content:
"Hey! Stop!" Katara and Toph said together.
They was a huge battle and Katara and Toph managed to escape with Sokka and bare-footed, unconciouss Aang.
Later that day, when Aang awoke, he ran to Sokka and said, "Sokka, can you please not tell any one that I'm ticklish, PLEASE!"
"Sure, if you don't tell anyone about me, deal," Sokka said.
"Yeah, of course," Aang said.
"Good," Sokka said.




THE END
1122122111.title: Katara and Toph to the rescue

choices: Teased Zuko's nose with a feather
1131.content: It was morning and Aang woke up and yawned. He saw a note next to his sleeping bag stating that Sokka, Toph and Katara all went out to get breakfast and to keep an eye on Zuko. Aang snorted then looked up. He saw Zuko, still asleep. He was bored and wanted to play. Aang scrambled up and airscootered to Zuko, "HI ZUKO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" He yelled. Zuko responded with a snore. Aang pouted, "Aww, Monkey Feathers! ... Why do i keep saying that?" he stared at Zuko, hoping he would feel eyes staring at him, but it didn't work, "C'mon wake up!" he said and poked Zuko in the ribs. Zuko's body stiffened and jerked away from the poke then relaxed. Aang's eyes widened, "Is Zuko... nah... he's the Fire Prince." Aang looked around then poked Zuko again, harder. Zuko whined, pushed Aang's hand away then rolled on his other side. Aang stared with his mouth open, "Zuko is... He;s ticklish!" Aang whispered loudly to himself. His face lit up as he smirked with an idea. Aang then...
1131.title: Aang

11312.content:
Aang cracked his fingers and began to tickle Zuko's ribs. Zuko immidietly bursted into laughter. Aang smiled as he continued. Zuko shot up and stared at Aang. Aang smiled and waved at Zuko.
"Goodmorining Hotman!" Aang smiled. Zuko glared at him.
"Why were you tickling me?" he asked.
"'Cause I was trying to wake you up. I poked you, then you jumped and I figured you were ticklish."
"I'm not ok? So leave me alone!" Zuko stated, angrily, pulled the cover over his head. Aang pouted then smirked.
"If you're not ticklish then why did you jump?" Aang asked cleverly. Zuko remained quiet. Aang smirked and poked him in the ribs. Zuko jumped and grumbled. Aang giggled playfully and poked him rapidly. Zuko squirmed and giggled, "'not ticklish' huh?" Aang teased. Zuko pushed the covers from his head and grabbed Aang's hands. He poked Zuko in the rib's with his foot, which made Zuko squeal, then pined him down, "Where should I tickle you first?" he asked himself. Aang then...
11312.title: Started tickling his sides

choices: Zuko turns the tables on Aang
113121.content:
Aang turned around with his back facing Zuko and pulled off the firebender's boots off along with his socks.

"This will get a better reaction out of you." Aang giggled and ran all ten fingers up and down Zuko's bare feet.

Zuko yelped and bit down on his lower lip, he tried valiantly to keep his laughter in while Aang's long fingers moved through the firebender's sensitive toes and down his smooth soles.

"Just a little bit more Zuko, and you'll break." Aang teased and moved his fingers faster.

"No fair! No hahahahahahah fair HAHHAAHHAHAHAH!" He screamed with laughter covered his face with his hands. "HHAHAHA PLEASE AHAHAHAH STOP AHAHAHHHAHA!"

With his last remaining strength...
113121.title: Decided to tickle Zuko's feet

1131211.content:
Suddenly without warning zuko pushed aang off him and pinned aang down!
Aang:Hey,no fair!
Zuko:*huffing and puffing*Now how do you like it!
Then zuko starts tickling aangs stomach rapidly!
Aang:HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAASTOHAAHAHAHAHAHHAHHAHHANOHOHOHAHAHAHAHAAAAHAHAHAHAHHA HAHAHHA!!
Aang:Oh yeah well take this!He blew into zuko's face and froze it a bit making him jump off and aang used earth bending he trapped zuk's hands and feet from moving.
Zuko:Stop or I'll...
Just then aang he tickled his ribbs and armpits and zuko wiggled and laughed hard.
Zuko:HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHSTOOOOHOHOHHHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAANOWHOWHOHOAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHHHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA1
Aang gave him a break and decided to tickle his..........

choices: She, doesn't know what to do so she goes to get Katara
11331.content:
One night, when Toph was walking back to the main hall of the Airbending temple, she noticed a small whole in the wall. When, she looked at it more closely, it gave her a great idea. The night Zuko, pleaded to join the group, he burned her feet, and she was REALLY blinded for a whole day.

Later that night, she went to Zuko and asked, "Hey, Zuko, do you think you could help me with something."
"Sure," Zuko replied.

After dinner Toph led Zuko to the hole and said,"I was playing with my bracelet and I threw far into that hole and for some reason, I can't bend it out or see anything in there."
"Well, that's strange, but I 'll get it," he said, crawling into the hole.
He kept crawling until all that was only his feet were sticking out."Hey Toph, I think I'm at the end of the tunnel and I don't think its here," Zuko said.
"Right," Toph said, smiling mischievously, "This is for burning my feet."
"What is, Ah!" Zuko yelled as Toph earthbended the hole shut around his body, restricting his movements so much, that all he could do was move his feet, a little.

"Now, what to do," Toph said, grinning evilly.
11331.title: Toph's Idea

choices: Toph decides to go get something
Toph, goes for his upper body
113312.content:
"Zuko, now that you're a part of our team, I can't hurt you, but that doesn't mean I can't get revenge!" Toph said.
"What do you mean?" Zuko asked.
"I mean, I'm going to take off these little boots and see if these wittle footsies are ticklish," Toph, said, maniacally.
"NOOO! Please don't tickle me," Zuko yelled.
"Why, is the Fire Price ticklish?" Toph asked in a babying tone.
"Yes, its my biggest weakness, Azula used to tickle me all the time," Zuko stated.
"Sorry, Zuko, but I can't resist," Toph said, as she slipped of his boots, revealing his soft pale soles. She started to drag her fingers lightly all over his feet, causing him to gasp and giggle. She kept on, until she reached a spot at the top, middle of his arches, right under the ball of his feet.
When she reached there Zuko shrieked with laughter, "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOOOOOO HEHEHEHAHAHIHI DON'T HAHAHA STOP!"
"Oh, don't stop okay, if you say so," Toph teased. "Looks like I found a sweet spot," She said, tickling that spot again.
"PLEEASE DON'T TICKLE ME ANY MORE AHAHAHA PLEASE I CAN'T TAKE IT HAHAHA," Zuko screamed. "NOOO DON'T TICKLE THERE EITHER HAHAHAHA AHAHAHHA NOOHOHOHAHA HIHIHIHA!" he screamed, as she tickled under and between his toes.

"I think its time to try something different," Toph said.

1133121211.content:
"I think, you've almost had enough" Toph said, " I'll just tickle your feet a little more and then, I'll let you out."
"Well, Ha then, my feet are trapped in rock and if you take either one out I'll be able to break free!" Zuko pointed out.
"Who, says I'll need to take them out of the rock to tickle them," she said.
"Then how will you..." Zuko started, just then, Toph started to make the earth aroungd Zuko's feet, have little ridges, and then made it vibrate causing him to laugh out loud, all over again," HAHAHAHA HOOW ARE YOUHOOHOO DOOING THAHAHAT! STOOHAHAP I'M REALLY HAHAREALLY SORRY ABOUHAHAT BUNING YOURHEHEHE FEEHEHEHET!"

"Oh, alright, I guess you've had enough," Toph said, releasing him from the rock.
"Thanks, please don't do that ever again," Zuko begged.
"Well, I'm not making any promises, but, I'll try," Toph replied.
"Come on, we're even now, let's go back and join the others," Zuko said.
"Yeah, your right, let's go," Toph agreed giving him one last poke before they walked off towards base camp.

When Azula goes towards Katara, she is terrified of the tickle torture to come. "Look at this vulnerable, helpless, weak belly of yours. I wounded how long you'll be able to stand the tickling at that spot." Azula says teasingly, knowing that it would only scare Katara even more. She had made her nails extra sharp for this, so that their tickle torture would be too extreme for them to escape. "Let us go!!!" Yelled Katara.
Azula ignored her and started the tickling. She spider tickled all over Katara's helpless belly and would occasionally dig her fingers into Katara's sides as well. This drove her nuts. "Ahahahahahahahahahaha Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha ahaha!!! Ahahahahahahaha stahahahahap that, pleeeeeaaase! Ahaha cut it out! Ahahahahahahahahahaha Ahahahahahahahahahaha ahaha come on, Ahahahahahahahahahaha stahahahap!!!" She laughed hysterically. Azula continued and started to speed up, "Why would I ever stop now, I'm just getting started. Plus I don't think I'm quite ready to hand you over to the Fire Lord, just yet".
Now Azula let one of her fingers slip into Karara's belly button, her extra sharp nails made this unbearable for poor Katara. Her finger would twist, turn, and spin inside Katara's belly button, pushing her over the edge. "Nahahahahat my belly..... Ahahahahahahahahahaha button!!! Ahahahahahahahahahaha Ahahahahahahahahahaha Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha Ahahahahahahahahahaha pleeeeeeeaaase, stahahahahahahahahap! Nohohohohohohoho no more!!!"

She leant over and swirled her tongue around. Katara screeched in helpless laughter. ''HAHAHAHAHAHAAH. NO, NO, NO,HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA. PLEEHEHESSSAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! I'm beg ahahahahahahaha I heheheeh nng hahahaha you.'' I'm sure you are.'' Azula replied before reaching for another implement. Katara strained against her bondage was held fast. ''I wonder what my dear friend Mister Feather would think of you.'' She tipped the feather inside her belly button and swirled it around. This set off another spout of hysteria.

         She moved down to where she could reach her thighs. She momentarily set aside the feather to dig at her thighs. Katara was helpless as she dug her nails into sensitive flesh. Then moved down to her feet. Using her tongue and Mister feather, she brought Katara to another realm of helpless laughter. Nibbling on her toes and getting between her toes with the feather, Azula finally glanced down at her exhausted captive. ''My you do look exhausted. Good thing I have other play things to amuse myself with.'' So saying, she left Katara in helpless fear for her friends. They had to escape. she thought frantically. They'd never survive otherwise.

1212.content: Toph found herself in an Earthen binds. Her feet in stocks of Earth and her hands held down on her rock seating arrangement with Earth bended shackles. She was currently plotting revenge. As a certain air bender had gotten the best of her. Honey covered her soles and Oppa was licking her soles. She'd been this way for over an hour now and still no hope of rescue had presented itself. Oh yeah, Aang, your dead. She thought as she pondered how to get out of this sticky situation.
1212.title: Toph

121311.content:
Ty Li was visiting one of her favorite captives at ''The Boling Rock''. A top fire nation prison run by her friend Mai's uncle. Sitting in front of her was ex-Kyoshi warrior Suki. Hands bound behind her back she glared at the girl. ''Come back to gloat?', she questioned angrily. Ty Li smiled down at her. She lifted a foot into her lap. ''I've missed you since last we met.'' She lightly ran her finger down the girl's sole. Suki's foot trembled slightly. Suki tried to rein herself. Ty LI just kept smiling and stroking her foot. ''You've always struck me as a laugher.'' She ran her fingers a little harder on the wiggling sole in her grasp. ''Now I aim to prove that.'' She set a full attack on Suki's helpless foot. Suki laughed controllably which only encouraged Ty Li further. ''See, I knew it.'' She grasped Suki's other foot and tickled them relentlessly to the background music of laughter.

         A good half an hour later she stopped. Suki struggled to catch her breath. Setting her feet down, Ty Li approached her captive. ''I think a new angle is needed here.'' She dug into Suki's ribs, setting her off again. Poor Suki's helpless laughter could be heard throughout the hallways. Being a prison, no one bothered to investigate the noise. Prison life was rough and sometimes, being a prisoner was a struggle, to make it out alive again.

The badger sloth sniffed her feet before taking tentative licks. Ty Li wiggled her feet trying to evade the animal's tongue. But using it's sharp clawed paws, it managed to hold her foot down to lick off the mystery substance. Unintentionally raking it's claws down her feet as well. Ty Li was helpless with laughter when something jolted her awake.

         She found herself gagged and hogtied. She couldn't budge free. There was Azula, smirking at her bedside. ''My Ty Li, what an interesting dream you were having. Shall we make it come to pass. That said, she took the girl's braid and brushed it down her exposed armpits. ''I think we''ll have a bit of fun, you and I.'' She continued to torment a bound and gagged Ty Li to her friend's distress.
12221.title: A badger-sloth to lick her feet

1223.content:
It was a disgruntled Zuko that slammed the door to his inner chambers. A mischievous Azula had told him there was a surprise waiting in his room. Thinking she'd done something to his terrible, he hastened there just to find... He had to step back to take in what his eyes were telling him. At first he was troubled, then he started to smile. On his bed, was a barefoot Mai with a gag in her mouth, lying on her stomach spread eagle. And looking absolutely furious too. He closed the door and moved to the bed. On the side table was a note. Thought you'd like to work off some steam. A.

         Zuko smiled again and looked around to see tickle implements spread around the room. Mai was definitely trying to get something through to him. He took off the gag and she exploded. ''What are you waiting for, untie me! When I see that sister of yours I'm gonna...' Her rant died off as she took in the look on his face. ''Zuko, what's wrong?, she asked trembling just a mite. He smoothed her hair back. ''Nothing at all.'' She sighed in relief and said ''hurry up and untie me then, come on.'' Zuko picked up one of Mai's daggers and slowly led it's side down one sole and between her toes. Her foot jerked slightly in his grip. ''I don't think that's happening anytime soon. My captive princess.'' Mai shuddered slightly at what would unfold.
1223.title: Mai

info.brief_description: This is a story about the characters from Avatar and how they get tickled. Enjoy!
info.description:
This FanFic is about the characters of avatar in season 3 and and the situations in which they get tickled.

Avatar: The Last Airbender was not created by me but by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko and is on Nickelodeon.

-Please keep it PG
-No nudity
-No Sex
-No cursing

Other than that, please add on as much as you like.
